articles.description: After hunkering down for the holidays in 2020, far more travelers are expected to be on the move this year.
articles.content:

articles.author: Kevin Reynolds
articles.title: Delta-8 temporarily legal in Texas after judge sides with CBD dispensary - The Texas Tribune
articles.description: A Travis County judge temporarily blocked the state from listing delta-8 as a Schedule I drug, which effectively made it illegal. The cannabis extract became popular because users say it produces the “high” effect of marijuana.
articles.content:
Sign up for The Brief, our daily newsletter that keeps readers up to speed on the most essential Texas news.
